name: Adobe Collage File
summary: File created by Adobe Collage, an Adobe Touch App used for creating modern moodboards; may contain graphics and other content from .PDF , .PSD , and .AI files; can also include hand-drawn pen graphics and text; may be uploaded and shared on the Adobe Creative Cloud.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: Adobe Photoshop with Adobe Collage COLZ script
